content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Mr. Abbasi, while I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Duisburg, let us focus solely on discussing the rental price during our negotiation. To initiate our discussion, I propose a price of 1200 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing your initial proposal. However, I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment because I seek more competitive pricing options. Let's explore possibilities for a lower rental fee.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because seeking lower rental fees does not align with my goal of maximizing the income from this apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
